content.description:
Stand start on a low foot rail and use small crimps for hands. Step up on the crimp rail and move out left. Slap up the side to reach a small crimp. Topout from here. 

Note: the crimps will wear on your fingertips - the name says it all!
content.location:
Bottom of the Bulge area, located on the edge of a dropoff. 

From Shamu Area: Follow the trail NE (to the right if you're looking at Help Meat and The Box in Shamu area). It's the first large boulder after passing the main Bulge trail (on the left).  

From Smiley Area: Follow the trail that wraps around the left side of the Smiley boulder. Keep right on the trails. You should see a long boulder to the left (Multiple Personalities), stay right and go uphill to the Bulge. Slice will be on the right. Warning: you may end up in the Shamu area if you take a left trail on the uphill portion after the Mult-P boulder.

From the Education Center: Follow interpretive trail to second three-way split (trail 4). Go right. At the next split, go left onto trail 15. Follow the trail to the second post on the left at approx. 450 yards (first post on the left is 45 Area; second post on the left is Smiley Area). Follow directions from Smiley Area.
